member.name: T:UnityEngine.ClusterNetwork
member.summary: A helper class that contains static method to inquire status of Unity Cluster.

summary.para: Check whether the current instance is disconnected from the cluster network.

A client node is disconnected when it fails to receive a signal within a timeout period while a master node is disconnected when it fails to receive a signal from all its client nodes within a timeout period. Note that a disconnected instance continues running and does not terminate itself.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.ClusterNetwork.isMasterOfCluster
member.summary: Check whether the current instance is a master node in the cluster network.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.ClusterNetwork.nodeIndex
member.summary: To acquire or set the node index of the current machine from the cluster network.
